postText:
Hey, Porkchop here... 
Someone took this nice headshot of me while I was deep in thought... 
Why is my name Porkchop? It fits me really well, but I'm not sure why?

Me and (part of) my family! We have about 20 of us missing, but we've never been good at getting us all in one picture. We had so much fun at my cousins housewarming party! 
I'm all the way on the left!

Hey y'all, 
Lil Bow Wow here with an update! My new album 'Animal House' is dropping this Winter! 
Checkout lilbowwow.com for more info, stay beasts.

I, not events, have the power to make me happy or unhappy today. I can choose which it shall be. Yesterday is dead, tomorrow hasn't arrived yet. I have just one day, today, and I'm going to be happy in it.
Visited my extended family at their lakehouse in Lake Geneva!

My master's pats Ooooo. 
 I love my master's scritchesss. 
Like if you love your master's pets!!!
Just finished my photoshoot for my cleopatra cosplay! Checkout more at my onlypaws (link on my profile)
My master put me on a diet and I'm not very happy. I will post regularly to show my progress and keep me motivated!
I told him to stay out of the litter box. I think the dog learned his lesson though....
